Description:
Identifies when a user has been assigned a privilege role and are not using that role.

Author: Mark Morowczynski '@markmorow', Gloria Lee, '@gleeiamglo'
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Roles Are Not Being Used
Query: sourcetype='azure-pim' eql select * from _source_ where riskeventtype = 'redundantassignmentalertincident'
